main event: Civilians reported a sighting of an object skimming at 10,000 ft in St. Albans, New York on January 11, 1955.
interesting points: The sighting involved one unidentified object,The object was observed skimming at a high altitude of 10,000 feet,There is insufficient data to evaluate the sighting further,The incident is classified as a civilian sighting,Reports note that the object let up and went out of sight before returning.
witness description: civilians who reported the sighting to the police
